title: My Pixel USB-C earbuds do not skip songs on Spotify when I press the center button twice (Google ins
content: My Pixel USB-C earbuds do not skip songs on Spotify when I press the center button twice (Google instructions here: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/9140284?hl=en). How do I fix this? I can ask Google Assistant to skip the song but this takes longer than a simple double click on the earphone button.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
